text: @stayceespeaks They cannot. The illogical will also be that way. Trust me. When this all started, I LISTENED to my own hospital coworkers as they reacted to #COVID19 . Those supporting Trump said the same thing: "this is nothing ".Today? Most either sought retirement or pretend they never spoke https://t.co/pqSsMMdA8u
